section.title: SITE Commands
section.p: This document describes all the FTP SITE commands implemented.

section.title: SITE DESCUSER <username>
section.source: 200- uid : admin userpassword : ******** homedirectory : C:\ writepermission : true enableflag : true idletime : 0 uploadrate : 0 downloadrate : 0 200

section.title: SITE HELP
section.p: It displays all the available SITE commands.
section.source: 200- DESCUSER : display user information. HELP : display this message. STAT : show statistics. WHO : display all connected users. ZONE : display timezone. 200 End of help.

section.title: SITE STAT
section.p: This command displays different server statistics information. Only admin user has the permission to execute this.
section.source: 200- Start Time : 2005-09-01T12:10:11 File Upload Number : 0 File Download Number : 0 File Delete Number : 0 File Upload Bytes : 0 File Download Bytes : 0 Directory Create Number : 0 Directory Remove Number : 0 Current Logins : 1 Total Logins : 1 Current Anonymous Logins : 0 Total Anonymous Logins : 0 Current Connections : 1 Total Connections : 1 200

section.title: SITE WHO
section.p: This command displays all currently logged-in user information. It displays the user name, client IP, login time and last access time. Only admin user has the permission to execute this.

section.title: SITE ZONE
section.p:
This command displays the timezone information of the FTP server in RFC 822 4-digit time zone format. The format is
Sign TwoDigitHours TwoDigitMinutes
